import React from 'react' import ProductsCounter from '../productCounter/productCounter'; import './itemDetail.css'; import RelationProducts from '../relationProducts/RelationProducts'; const itemDetail = ({item}) => { console.log(item) console.log(item.categoria) return(

{item.nombre}

Precio: {item.precio}US$

ProductID:

{item.id}

) } export default itemDetail
